name: Nestar Energy
description: Introducing Lunar Power! We generate renewable energy by re-timing the moon's gravitational pull on ocean tides. Cheaper and more reliable than wind & solar; massive enough to supply more than a THIRD of global electricity demand.
one_liner: Introducing Lunar Power! We generate renewable energy by re-timing the moon's gravitational pull on ocean tides. Cheaper and more reliable than wind & solar; massive enough to supply more than a THIRD of global electricity demand.
